name: Post Links
author: Henrik Melin, Kal Ström

sections.description:
This plugin adds a box on the Write/Edit page where links associated with the post can be entered. There is not limit to how many links can be added to a post – simply click ‘Add a new link’ to add more.

Each link has a url and a title, which forms the actual link. An optional description can be added, which will appear underneath the link in the template.

Please see http://labs.dagensskiva.com/plugins/post-links/ for more information on how to use this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the post-links folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php post_links(); ?> where you want the links to appear

short_description: This plugin adds a box on the Write/Edit page where (any number of) links related to the post can be entered.
